posts.post_content:
The following cards are available from this lot:

[url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=24608[/url]

Mutrie, both Barnes cards, Loftus/Cleveland, Burnham

The Watkins is on hold for right now, but could be available

The Barnie card could be had for the right(high) price, so if you really want it let me know.

Everything else is sold or being kept

Barnes, port $425
   Mutrie $450
   Loftus, Cleveland $200
   Burnham $300

   The Barnie can be had for $750, which means I'd rather keep it, but if you will pay that much, I'd sell it. All the others are priced to sell. Paypal preferred. Prices include insured shipping/tracking

   ***GROUP DEAL IN NEXT POST***

This was the top thread anyway, so I'm not really bumping it :)

   If anyone wants the Barnie, Loftus, Barnes and Burnham, they can be had as a group for $1500 paypal gift, or check

   That is $175 off the price above individually.

   I didn't realize I didn't have a Mutrie card yet, so now I'm okay with keeping either him or Barnie

Anyone want to make any group offers, or offer up trades?  Will trade well for your Madden/leaning on rock pose, or Corcoran cards of course. Might be some other cards I'm interested in if you want to make an offer

John--I would trade cards remaining from Lots 47 or 49 for the killer B's (Barnie, Barnes, Burnham)

Jay
